snippet.title: Mandela Invasion - Try to survive the night in this FNAF-like game inspired by Mandela Catalogue!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://broken-arrow-games.itch.io/mandela-invasion?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Mandela Invasion is a short, free, "point and click" survival horror game.

You wake up in your room, but you notice that not everything is as it should be. You hear a knock on the door and you decide to check it out. This could be the scariest night of your life.

Whoever it is, don't let them in. You have to survive by 6am.

Remember, even if you think you are safe... You are wrong...

This game is inspired by Mandela Catalogue videos from Youtube, created by Alex Kister.

➡️ More from Broken Arrow Games https://broken-arrow-games.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More horror games https://itch.io/games/tag-horror?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames #horror
